name: STO Operating System Token
description: STO Chain aims to become a major global marketplace for tokenized investments, providing seamless access to digital assets worldwide. Through strategic partnerships, we are building a secure and transparent framework for the on-chain exchange of high-value, low-liquidity assets such as real estate and bonds using distributed ledger technology.
